    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbilityManager
    Manages RPG abilities (charges, slots, execution).
    AbilityType
    Ability types enum.
    AudioManager
    Manages all audio for the game including sound effects and background music.
    Board
    Interface defining the core game board operations for Tetris.
    Brick
    Interface representing a Tetris brick (piece).
    BrickGenerator
     
    BrickRotator
    Manages rotation state for Tetris pieces.
    ClearRow
    Data class containing information about cleared rows.
    DownData
    Data class containing information returned from down movement events.
    EventSource
    Enum representing the source of a move event.
    EventType
    Enum representing the types of move events in the Tetris game.
    GameAnimationManager
    Manages all game animations and timeline operations.
    GameAnimationManager.MoveDownCallback
     
    GameController
    Main game controller that coordinates game logic and user input.
    GameInputHandler
    Handles all keyboard input processing for the game.
    GameInputHandler.GameActionCallback
     
    GameLayoutManager
    Manages layout and positioning of game UI elements.
    GameMenuNavigator
    Handles navigation back to main menu from game.
    GameMode
    Enum representing different game modes available in Tetris.
    GameModeManager
    Manages game mode specific logic and timers.
    GameModeManager.GameModeCallback
     
    GameOverPanel
     
    GameStateManager
    Manages game state (pause and game over).
    GameUIRenderer
    Handles all UI rendering responsibilities for the game view.
    GameViewController
     
    InputEventListener
    Interface for handling user input events in the Tetris game.
    LevelProgressionCalculator
    Calculates RPG level progression.
    Main
    Main entry point for the Tetris application.
    MainMenu
    MainMenu class implementing OOP principles for software maintenance coursework.
    MatrixOperations
    Utility class providing static methods for matrix operations used in Tetris.
    MenuAnimationManager
    Manages all menu animations and visual effects.
    MenuBase
    Abstract base class for menu systems.
    MenuController
    Controller for the main menu screen.
    MenuInterface
    Interface defining contract for menu operations.
    MenuMediaManager
    Manages background video and audio for the menu.
    MenuNavigationManager
    Manages navigation between different menu screens and game launching.
    MenuNavigationManager.MediaCallback
     
    MenuStateManager
    Manages menu state transitions and UI visibility.
    MenuStateManager.AnimationCallback
     
    ModeSelectionController
    Controller for the mode selection screen.
    MoveEvent
    Represents a move event in the Tetris game.
    NextShapeInfo
    Data class containing information about the next rotation shape of a brick.
    NotificationPanel
     
    PausePanel
     
    RandomBrickGenerator
     
    RPGConfig
    RPG Mode configuration constants.
    RPGLevelUpManager
    Manages RPG level-up popup functionality.
    RPGModeManager
    Manages all RPG mode functionality including level progression, ability management, speed scaling, and garbage block spawning.
    RPGSpeedScaler
    Updates game speed based on RPG level.
    Score
    Represents the game score with JavaFX property binding support.
    ScoreManager
    Manages score persistence and tracking for all game modes.
    SettingsController
    Controller for the settings screen.
    SettingsManager
    Manages game settings including key bindings, audio, and other preferences.
    SlowTimeManager
    Manages slow time ability functionality.
    SlowTimeManager.SpeedUpdateCallback
     
    TetrisBoard
    Implementation of the Board interface for Tetris game logic.
    VideoManager
    Manages background video and vignette effects for gameplay.
    ViewData
    Data class containing all information needed to render the game view.
